getMethods().details: The registry pulls these methods when installing the plugin. Requirements: - The plugin must implement at least one method.

returns.methods: The array of the methods implemented by the plugin.

onStreamCanceled(uint256,address,uint128.details: Requirements: - Must be delegate called. - The caller must be an address listed in the archive.

params.recipient: The stream's recipient, who canceled the stream.
params.recipientAmount: The amount of assets left for the stream's recipient to withdraw, denoted in units of the asset's decimals.
params.senderAmount: The amount of assets refunded to the stream's sender, denoted in units of the asset's decimals.
params.streamId: The id of the canceled stream.

archive().notice: Retrieves the address of the archive contract.

getMethods().notice: Retrieves the methods implemented by the plugin.

onStreamCanceled(uint256,address,uint128.notice: Forwards the refunded assets to the proxy owner when the recipient cancel a stream whose sender is the proxy contract.
